column6: Stephen Strange and his new apprentice travel not to the Ruins of Raggador or the Dread Dimension of Dormammu...but to a small Southern town conducting a bizarre ritual of its own, one that threatens the life of every young girl in the state!  Plus: more on the secrets that Stephen himself is hiding from his student! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Tomm Coker | colorist:Daniel Freedman | colorist:Christina Strain | inker:Emma Rios | writer:Mark Waid
